content:
As a result of the Russian rocket strike, the roof of three private homes in the Mirgorod district of Poltava region was damaged.

About thisreportedThe head of the Poltava Regional State Administration Philip Pronin.

Mobile fire groups worked for air purposes in the Kremenchug district.

The head of the ODA noted that in Poltava region the preventive shutdowns were used and a schedule of emergency shutdowns was entered.

“The situation is under control. Energy are already working to restore power supply. We unfold in the area of unbreakable ones to work, people can charge gadgets and be constantly communicated, ”the message reads.

Currently, more than 104 thousand household consumers and 6700 legal entities have been deactivated in the region.

“In fact, these are preventive shutdowns to balance the power system. We keep calm. Experts carry out restorative work, ”Philip Pronin added.

As reported by the Armyinform, Russia todayShe hitOn hydraulic structures and dams on Dniproges in Zaporozhye, but there is no threat of breakthrough of the dam.
title: In the Poltava region, the wreckage of crawled missiles damaged houses, emergency shutdowns were introduced
description: This was reported by the head of the Poltava Regional State Administration Philip Pronin. Mobile fire groups ...
author: Army Inform
